title: Did SSW come up with the skin concepts
body: Did SSW come up with the skin concepts for the SSW skins?

replies.body: Did they have any influence on the choice of champ or the look of the champ at all?
They do have some input, and help with suggestions of champions they'd like.
So the KinddleJack was behind all this...
When are they available now again?? riot said 14. mat but they was a bug ? when are they back online again
